title: New: Candy Paint – One Hundred
body:
Two weeks since falling in love with the sleazy grit of California’s **Candy Paint** and their debut track [Vomit Lips](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19205-new-candy-paint-vomit-lips/) (a slang sexual term if you must know), and the group are back and even better. _One Hundred_ ramps up the level of ‘epic-rocky-ness’, with a ball-busting chorus and a Black Lips style swagger, there’s few acts around at the moment with the talent and attitude of **Candy Paint**.

_Do we erase our clouded minds to feel no pain? / Do we, do we still shame the same?_
